subject: Baseball
Shea Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Cubs pitcher Jason Marquis hit a grand slam off the Mets rookie Jon Niese as New York continued its slide, falling 2 and 1/2 games back of the Phillies and maintaining only a one game lead in the N.L. wild-card race.
snippet: Cubs pitcher Jason Marquis hit a grand slam off the Mets rookie Jon Niese as New York continued its slide, falling 2 and 1/2 games back of the Phillies and maintaining only a one game lead in the N.L. wild-card race.
